content:
I apologize for not sharing more about the artwork earlier. As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or own artwork, but I'd be happy to help you with your artwork arrangement.

Please feel free to share more about the artwork you've chosen for your living room. What style or theme do they have? Are they all from the same artist or different artists? Are they paintings, prints, photographs, or other mediums?

Sharing more about your artwork will help me provide more specific advice on the arrangement and frame choices. I'm here to help you create a beautiful and harmonious display that showcases your artwork in the best possible way!
